forest.description: There is a sign at the beginning of a well lit bridge to the north.  There is a path to the east.  There is a small shed nearby.
shed: The shed is small and musty.
There is a shovel leaning against the wall.

forest.description: The path leads north to a lovely castle.  There is an opening to the south.
You feel a chill run through your body.  The ground feels soft.
